beastapi/beastmanager.h File Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: What's New in Beast 2013.0.x, Setting Up Your Project, Upgrade Requirements for 2013.0.x, Initializing and Terminating Beast, Using the Cache, What's New in Beast 2013.2.x, Debugging, Programming in Non-C Languages, Known Issues with Distribeast.

#include "beastapitypes.h"

File Description

The beast manager is the core object for all interaction with the Beast API.

Defines
#define  ILB_BEAST_INTERFACE_VERSION   5

Enumerations
enum   ILBCacheScope { ILB_CS_GLOBAL, ILB_CS_LOCAL }
enum   ILBLogSink {
  ILB_LS_NULL, ILB_LS_STDOUT, ILB_LS_STDERR, ILB_LS_FILE,
  ILB_LS_DEBUG_OUTPUT
}
enum   ILBLogType { ILB_LT_ERROR, ILB_LT_INFO }

Functions

Define Documentation

#define ILB_BEAST_INTERFACE_VERSION   5
Search for all occurrences

Revision number for released headers.

Will increase with every public release with interface changes

Examples:
include/beastapi/beastmanager.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ILBCacheScope
Search for all occurrences

Sets the scope for the cache.

Enumerator:
ILB_CS_GLOBAL 

Makes the cache global.

A different new beast manager using the same cache directory will be able to find cached resources

Search for all occurrences
ILB_CS_LOCAL 

Makes the cache local.

A different new beast manager using the same cache directory will not be able to find cached resources

Search for all occurrences
Examples:
include/beastapi/beastmanager.h.
enum ILBLogSink
Search for all occurrences

Enum selecting where to route messages.

Enumerator:
ILB_LS_NULL 

Discards messages.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_LS_STDOUT 

Routes messages to stdout.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_LS_STDERR 

Routes messages to stderr.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_LS_FILE 

Routes messages to a user specified file.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_LS_DEBUG_OUTPUT 

Routes messages to the debug output in visual studio when a debugger is connected.

Search for all occurrences
Examples:
include/beastapi/beastmanager.h.
enum ILBLogType
Search for all occurrences

Enum selecting a certain log target.

Enumerator:
ILB_LT_ERROR 

Error messages.

Search for all occurrences
ILB_LT_INFO 

Information messages and render progress messages.

Search for all occurrences
Examples:
include/beastapi/beastmanager.h.

Function Documentation

ILBStatus ILBClearCache ( ILBManagerHandle  beastManager )
Search for all occurrences

Clears the cache.

Will only work if there are no scenes present.

Parameters:
beastManager the beastManager to clear the cache for
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:
examples-physical/code/common/samplescommon.h, examples/code/atlas/atlas.cpp, examples/code/baking/baking.cpp, examples/code/cache/cache.cpp, examples/code/ernst/ernst.cpp, examples/code/lightsources/lightsources.cpp, examples/code/liveernst/liveernst.cpp, examples/code/lua/lua.cpp, examples/code/materials/materials.cpp, examples/code/occlusion/occlusion.cpp, examples/code/pointcloud/pointcloud.cpp, examples/code/readback/readback.cpp, examples/code/renderstats/renderstats.cpp, examples/code/rnm/rnm.cpp, examples/code/shbaking/shbaking.cpp, examples/code/simple/simple.cpp, examples/code/unwrapping/unwrapping.cpp, examples/code/uvset/uvset.cpp, include/beastapi/beastmanager.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmanagerwrapper.cpp.
static ILBStatus ILBCreateManager ( ILBConstString  cacheDirectory,
ILBCacheScope  cacheScope,
ILBConstString  licenseKey,
ILBManagerHandle *  beastManager 
) [inline, static]
Search for all occurrences

Creates a Beast Manager.

Parameters:
cacheDirectory sets the directory where the Beast Manager stores cached and temporary files.
cacheScope sets whether the cache is local to this beast manager or it can be reopened by another Beast Manager in the same directory.
licenseKey the license key provided to you as part of your evaluation/purchase.
beastManager a pointer to a Beast manager object that will receive the newly allocated handle
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:
examples-physical/code/common/samplescommon.h, examples/code/atlas/atlas.cpp, examples/code/baking/baking.cpp, examples/code/cache/cache.cpp, examples/code/ernst/ernst.cpp, examples/code/lightsources/lightsources.cpp, examples/code/liveernst/liveernst.cpp, examples/code/lua/lua.cpp, examples/code/materials/materials.cpp, examples/code/occlusion/occlusion.cpp, examples/code/pointcloud/pointcloud.cpp, examples/code/readback/readback.cpp, examples/code/renderstats/renderstats.cpp, examples/code/rnm/rnm.cpp, examples/code/shbaking/shbaking.cpp, examples/code/simple/simple.cpp, examples/code/unwrapping/unwrapping.cpp, examples/code/uvset/uvset.cpp, include/beastapi/beastmanager.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/plugincontext.cpp.
ILBStatus ILBDestroyManager ( ILBManagerHandle  beastManager )
Search for all occurrences

Destroys a Beast Manager
Will invalidate all resources and handles associated it as well.

Parameters:
beastManager the Beast Manager to destroy
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:
include/beastapi/beastmanager.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmanagerwrapper.cpp.
ILBStatus ILBSetBeastPath ( ILBManagerHandle  beastManager,
ILBConstString  beastPath 
)
Search for all occurrences

Sets where the Beast binaries are located.

The default search order is:
1. The bin directory of where the environment variable BEAST_ROOT points. I.E. BEAST_ROOT\bin. 2. The directory the beast dll is located in. When calling this, all other search paths are disregarded.

Parameters:
beastManager the BeastManager to set the root
beastPath the path to the Beast binaries
Returns:
ILB_ST_SUCCESS if everything went ok. ILB_ST_FILE_IO_ERROR if the specified directory doesn't contain a valid set of Beast binaries.
Examples:
examples-physical/code/common/samplescommon.h, examples/code/atlas/atlas.cpp, examples/code/baking/baking.cpp, examples/code/cache/cache.cpp, examples/code/ernst/ernst.cpp, examples/code/lightsources/lightsources.cpp, examples/code/liveernst/liveernst.cpp, examples/code/lua/lua.cpp, examples/code/materials/materials.cpp, examples/code/occlusion/occlusion.cpp, examples/code/pointcloud/pointcloud.cpp, examples/code/readback/readback.cpp, examples/code/renderstats/renderstats.cpp, examples/code/rnm/rnm.cpp, examples/code/shbaking/shbaking.cpp, examples/code/simple/simple.cpp, examples/code/unwrapping/unwrapping.cpp, examples/code/uvset/uvset.cpp, and include/beastapi/beastmanager.h.
static ILBStatus ILBSetLogTarget ( ILBLogType  type,
ILBLogSink  sink,
ILBConstString  filename 
) [inline, static]
Search for all occurrences

Sets where log messages should be routed.

Note this function is global rather than connected since some log messages happens before a beast manager may be present or known. Note, this method is not thread safe! Don't call it while other threads are using Beast

Parameters:
type the message type to route to this target
sink where to route the messages
filename the file to write the log info to. Only used if sink is ILB_LS_FILE
Returns:
ILB_ST_SUCCESS if routing was successful.
Examples:
examples-physical/code/common/samplescommon.h, examples/code/atlas/atlas.cpp, examples/code/baking/baking.cpp, examples/code/cache/cache.cpp, examples/code/ernst/ernst.cpp, examples/code/lightsources/lightsources.cpp, examples/code/liveernst/liveernst.cpp, examples/code/lua/lua.cpp, examples/code/materials/materials.cpp, examples/code/occlusion/occlusion.cpp, examples/code/pointcloud/pointcloud.cpp, examples/code/readback/readback.cpp, examples/code/renderstats/renderstats.cpp, examples/code/rnm/rnm.cpp, examples/code/shbaking/shbaking.cpp, examples/code/simple/simple.cpp, examples/code/unwrapping/unwrapping.cpp, examples/code/uvset/uvset.cpp, include/beastapi/beastmanager.h, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/plugincomponents.cpp.
ILBStatus ILBSetLogTargetFileHandle ( ILBLogType  type,
ILBFileHandle  handle 
)
Search for all occurrences

Sets where log messages should be routed.

Note this function is global rather than connected since some log messages happens before a beast manager may be present or known. Note, this method is not thread safe! Don't call it while other threads are using Beast

Parameters:
type the message type to route to this target
handle where to route the messages, or ILB_INVALID_FILE_HANDLE to disable logging
Returns:
ILB_ST_SUCCESS if routing was successful.
Examples:
include/beastapi/beastmanager.h.
ILBStatus ILBSetStringEncodingImp ( ILBStringEncoding  encoding )
Search for all occurrences

Sets the character type for Beast.

Should generally not be called explicitly but automatically called from ILBCreateManager or ILBSetLogTarget.

Parameters:
encoding the encoding for input and output strings.
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Examples:
include/beastapi/beastmanager.h.
